website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Zoom Wildhorse 5 is a trail running shoe designed for neutral runners. The shoe gained positive feedback from users. Some admired the shoe’s durability and grip while others are satisfied with the shoe’s roomy toe-box and cushioning. In summary, the Wildhorse 5 is indeed a successful update to the old version.
pros: Most users mentioned that the Nike Air Zoom Wildhorse 5 offers a nice blend of cushioning and ground feel
The shoe has a roomier toe-box than the previous version, noted in some reviews
A few lauded the laced of the shoe that stayed tight all through the run
Many runners commented that the grip of the Wildhorse 5 is excellent
According to some reviews, the shoe is durable
A couple of buyers said that the shoe performs both on-road and off-road surfaces
cons: A few mentioned that the Wildhorse 5 runs smaller than usual

customer_reviews.title: Bestest trail running shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love these trail runners! Great for switching to/from pavement if, like me, you need to run _to_ your wooded trail.to get started. Awesome traction. I don't run super technical trails at high speeds so Idk what that would be like in these shoes but I do run on some questionable, hard to see trails covered in roots and rocks with lots of hilly terrain in an effort to avoid people. And I'll run in any weather so there's been a fair amount of mud and sludge I've put them through. I've only done ~50k in them so far and they've been great!
customer_reviews.author: Chemen

customer_reviews.title: Very tight!
customer_reviews.text: No kidding these are very tight shoes! I'm a 7.5. When I first put them on It was heaven, I thought they were the most perfect shoes. When I did a work out in them, my feet swelled, as all feet do and they became so tight. The materiel doesn't stretch well. I kept the shoes on even so, walking around the house, and my feet are still hurting, the tightness (and pain) hasn't gone away. I'm going to try a size 8 because I want to give them a real chance.
customer_reviews.author: Cody G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these for walking around or walking on dirt or light hiking..
customer_reviews.text: Have them in a diff color from Urban Outfitters when they were on sale. Bought them here and fit exactly the same. Nice comfy supportive for Nike ( I usually wear Brooks Bedlam 2 or Gel Kayano Asics) This WIldhorse is the most supportive of the Nikes for me and my flat feet. TTS
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a narrow width in Nike sneakers. Having said that, the M width in this shoe fit very well. However, it was about a half size too short. Also has a great arch support but lacks padding in the toe area. Love the look but just not enough support for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: not like previous wildhorse models
customer_reviews.text: When Nike first came out with the Wildhorse model, I loved it! nice wide platform and toebox. I tend to roll my ankle when running on uneven ground, so I loved these. My toes where not crunched but the shoe didn't flop around. I was disappointed in the wildhorse 4 because the design made it tight around the top of the foot. So I was excited to see they designed the 5 differently. But the toebox on the 5 is narrow and tight and the quality is poor. I had them for a week when the bottom sole started to separate from the shoe. Sorry Nike. I can't say I will stick around for the Wildhorse 6.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking shoe and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This Nike is amazing. It is perfect for my foot. I was going to buy an all black Nike trail runner but loved the rich color of the Air Zoom Wildhorse 5 in geode teal with bright accents and so glad I did. It’s a sharp looking shoe. I will say that even though I wear a true 6.5, I sized up to a 7 based on suggestions of other review and glad I did. The 7 fits like it was made for my foot. I love the shape of the sole - not too bulky but a nice grip for various surfaces. Super light weight. I could wear these Nike’s every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sibyl Spencer-Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Lovelovelove
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fitting shoes! I absolutely love them! They are light weight and so comfortable. The colors are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Im happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I like them. A little snug around the arch. Good room in the toe box
customer_reviews.author: Nurib

customer_reviews.title: I want to order them. . Priduct is awsome
customer_reviews.text: The product is awsome but fitted small. I had to return them to get a bigger size. Iam dissapointed because they dont have other sizes. Please send a notification if you have a size 6 and a size 8 women size. This same color not other.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet with low arch
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I've had. Not great for road but fine for track and as one would expect great for trails. I enjoy them and as someone who values fit over cushion they are the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but they are super cute...
customer_reviews.text: Narrow but they are super cute... I love them so much I haven’t tried them on a muddy trail but so far I love them!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE SHOES!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They feel like an earth shoe and my foot is so comfortable! I get a lot of compliments on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slippery
customer_reviews.text: Overall great shoes but beware they are EXTREMELY slippery on hard surfaces. Have slipped down a full flight of stone stairs, on a freshly mopped floor in the grocery store...
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Too tight on my foot
customer_reviews.text: Am returning shoes as they were not comfortable on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn arnold

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I listened to the reviews and ordered a half size up but they were too big. Returned them for my actual size and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Long

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Has a wider toe box, which is what I was looking for! Vibrant colors with great support.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: She says they fit great she loves them. Look just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Great, but need more in store.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is perfect looking to get another one for my self.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortbale
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and fit of this shoe. Running outdoor trails takes a certain shoe that can wrap and support your foot as your ankle turns and foot fits to the dirt. As a soccer player, I have had multiple ankle injuries. I was super impressed with this shoe. I was also a little worried that the colors might look a little obnoxious but I thought the bright colors were nice. When i received them, they look more subtle and cooler in person.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Narrow indeed.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted so badly for these to fit! Im a nine, bought a nine, too tight, sent em back. Ordered a 9.5 and theyre still just too narrow and tight. Ive historically been a narrow foot girl which is why I thought these would work for me, in spite of the "narrow" reviews. Alas, I must send these back too and look for something else. I just cant afford to get out on the trail and have the shoes be unbearable 3 miles from my car! I love Nike. Maybe next season theyll have a new version and Ill try again!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wright

product_meta.title: Nike Women's WMNS Air Zoom Wildhorse 5 Track & Field Shoes
feature_bullets: A midsole rock plate helps shield your foot, while a Zoom Air heel unit cushions your stride on and off the path
Multi-layer mesh in the upper wraps your foot in lightweight breathability
Grippy outsole lugs are made for mud shedding
Skin overlays placed on high-wear areas enhance durability
